attributes.action: Fund the british people who want to leave Britain as well as funding those who want to come here to live.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Tony Blair should set up a fund to help the British people who want to leave Britain and all it stands for instead of funding those from other countries to come here.
We would all like the chance to see and live in another country but, the taxes we pay here stop us from being able to look at other options.

rejection.details:
This petition overlaps several in existence already -
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/pay-us-to-leave/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
